00018 #ifndef TLM_MASTER_SOCKET_H
00019 #define TLM_MASTER_SOCKET_H
00020 
00021 //#include <systemc.h>
00022 
00023 template <typename IF> class tlm_slave_socket;
00024 
00025 template <typename IF>
00026 class tlm_master_socket : public sc_port<IF>
00027 {
00028 public:
00029   typedef IF interface_type;
00030   typedef sc_port<interface_type> port_type;
00031   typedef sc_export<interface_type> export_type;
00032   typedef tlm_slave_socket<interface_type> slave_socket_type;
00033 
00034   friend class tlm_slave_socket<interface_type>;
00035 
00036 public:
00037   tlm_master_socket(const char* name) :
00038     port_type(name)
00039   {
00040   }
00041 
00042   //
00043   // Bind master socket to slave socket
00044   // - Binds the port of the master socket to the export of the slave socket
00045   // - Binds the port of the slave socket to the export of the master socket
00046   //
00047   void bind(slave_socket_type& s)
00048   {
00049     // master.port -> slave.export
00050     (*static_cast<port_type*>(this))(*static_cast<export_type*>(&s));
00051     // slave.port -> master.export
00052     s.mPort(mExport);
00053   }
00054 
00055   void operator() (slave_socket_type& s)
00056   {
00057     bind(s);
00058   }
00059 
00060   //
00061   // Bind master socket to master socket (hierarchical bind)
00062   // - Binds both the export and the port
00063   //
00064   void bind(tlm_master_socket& s)
00065   {
00066     // port
00067     (*static_cast<port_type*>(this))(*static_cast<port_type*>(&s));
00068     // export
00069     mExport(s.mExport);
00070   }
00071 
00072   void operator() (tlm_master_socket& s)
00073   {
00074     bind(s);
00075   }
00076 
00077   //
00078   // Bind interface to socket
00079   // - Binds the interface to the export of this socket
00080   //
00081   void bind(interface_type& ifs)
00082   {
00083     mExport(ifs);
00084   }
00085 
00086   void operator() (interface_type& s)
00087   {
00088     bind(s);
00089   }
00090 
00091 protected:
00092   export_type mExport;
00093 };
00094 
00095 #endif
